pattpack.expr_3
Class ExprFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pattpack.expr_3.ExprFactory
public class ExprFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a expression factory for a simple language of expressions. It constructs a expressions from tokens using a recursive descendant (LL) parser.

The language is defined by the following syntax, where ZERO_OR_MORE is a metasymbol with the obvious meaning 

  |   expr ::= addend ZERO_OR_MORE (("+" | "-") addend)
  |   addend ::= factor ZERO_OR_MORE (("*" | "/") factor)
  |   factor ::= number | "(" expr ")"

Build an expression from a sequence of tokens.
